attributes.comment:
1) The existing legal immigration process is completely broken. Fee increase
won't give any relief to legal immigrants.

2) I applied for my GC in FY 2001 and still I am waiting to file my AOS. Reforms
are required in each and every stage in legal immigration process.

3) For example, the new PERM process, premium I-140 & premium H1-B are
such reforms in the process. However they did more harm to the existing process
than help.

4) I strongly oppose to allocate part of increase fee to asylum, refugee and certain
other applicants. Such applicatns should have a separate process and Fed Govt
must support & fund that process.

5) Same as illegal immigrants. Fed Govt should build a new process for illegal
immigrants.

6) Look at H1B/L1B workers tax contributions to US Govt. Despite huge
contributions in all fronts, USCIS & DHS give least perference to legal immigrants.

Once again, I oppose any fee increase to existing schedule.

Thanks
Legal immigrant who lost faith on USCIS.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
